name: novel-word-count
description: Displays a word count, page count, and/or other statistics for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && sass styles.scss styles.css
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Isaac Lyman
